attributes.action: Pay for Credit Reference Checks for all parents affected by recent Data loss
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All parents should be entitled to funded credit reference checks which cost between £3 and £6 per month until lost data is found or it is confirmed that it is not in the hands of fraudsters.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
